CustomField.description: This field is used on the VCV Progress Note. Patient will call back if symptoms worsen or fail to improve over 48 hours; emergency department warnings reviewed. True if medical practitioner reviewed emergency department warnings during virtual visit
CustomField.inlineHelpText: By checking this box, the following text will be written to the VistA progress note: Caller/Patient advised to call facilityâ€™s VA Clinical Contact Center or seek immediate medical attention for new or worsening symptoms.
CustomField.label: Advised protocol for worsening symptoms
